articles.title: What happened to the Apple union campaign?
articles.description: Apple seemed primed for an organizing blitz like Starbucks and Trader Joe’s. Instead, after one store unionized in June, the campaign has gone quiet. Organizers say it’s part of a plan.
articles.content:
The tech giant seemed primed for an organizing blitz so whats next?

articles.title: Microsoft Teams is now fully optimized for Macs with M1 or M2 chips
articles.description: Microsoft is starting to release a new version of Teams for Apple Silicon Macs. Users with M1 or M2 Macs will start to get an optimized version in the coming months.

articles.title: Desk setup videos have taken over YouTube — and my life
articles.description: Creators showing off their home offices and desk setups have become hugely popular on YouTube, especially as the world adjusts to remote work. But how long can this keep up?
